attributes.action: I would like for alcohol bottles to have warning signs and pictures
attributes.additional_details:
In 2016 there were 7,327 alcohol-specific deaths in the UK, an age-standardised rate of 11.7 deaths per 100,000 population.

People lose there family members and loved ones down to alcohol, I feel that it is not taken as seriously as it should be. Alcohol is advertised all over the place, television, bill boards, supermarkets! 
Please help me try to prevent these death rates and show people what they could be doing to there bodies.
attributes.background: Alcohol can damage your body just as much as something such as smoking! I would like it if people was more aware of the side effects to drinking, and there be printed warning sign and pictures of what you could potentially be doing to your body while drinking!
